paper.title: Corporate Financial Analysis with efficient Logistic regressions and hybrids of neuro-genetic networks
paper.abstract: Financial institutions, portfolio managers and investors demand strong analytical methods of corporate finance to maintain lucrative investment portfolios. The volatility of stock prices, affected partially by the vast accounting data and the level of efficiency in the financial market require support by accurate decision making to increase the value of investments. Logistic regressions in Econometrics achieve significant results in financial analysis of companies, whilst Artificial Intelligence-as nonlinear regression systems- provides efficient corporate financial evaluations in longer computation time.

domain_result.justification: 该论文讨论了金融机构、投资组合管理者和投资者如何利用逻辑回归和神经遗传网络等方法来分析公司财务，以维持有利可图的投资组合。这直接关联到投资组合管理的核心目标，即通过准确的分析和决策来增加投资价值。
